title: How Sassy Changed My Life
content:
Any ideas on the type used on the book cover for "How Sassy Changed My Life"?  
The slab seems very close to Egyptian505EF-Light, but its not quite it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018085318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sassy_5598.png)

Thanks in advance,

Seb
author: all about seb

comments.content: Conor & Michel, thanks for you help!
Wow, I've never paid Saxony Script any mind. Looks mighty fine on there.
